sentences.english: With perseverance one surmounts all difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 只要堅韌不拔，就能戰勝萬難。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, a successful person is capable of setting goals and paving the way against all odds.
sentences.chinese: 就事論事，成功者懂得立定目標，又能排除萬難鋪路。

sentences.english: He protected the President against all odds in Area 7.
sentences.chinese: 他對保護區的7排除萬難主席。

sentences.english: Be resolute, fear no sacrifice and surmount every difficulty to win victory.
sentences.chinese: 下定決心，不怕犧牲，排除萬難，去爭取勝利。
